Address.Address1: The Palm Jumeirah, East Crescent road

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sofitel Dubai The Palm Resort & Spa in Dubai (Palm Jumeirah), you'll be convenient to Aquaventure. This 5-star resort is within the vicinity of Ski Dubai and Mall of the Emirates.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 543 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. 40-inch flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After dipping into one of the 2 indoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can get to nearby shops on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Take advantage of the resort's 24-hour room service. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the resort pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Dubai? This resort has 13149 square feet (1222 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the resort's 24-hour room service. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the resort pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Sofitel Dubai The Palm Resort & Spa is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
